description: The Scorpion is a young and inexperienced leader. And admittedly his castles are just as small and trivial as his princedom. Still: Do not underestimate him! Of all desert lords he might be most eager to prove himself...
taunt_1: The Grim Reaper comes to us all. And he always approaches without sound... just cast a glance over your shoulder - he could be standing behind you already...
taunt_2: You think of us as barbarians - I will take pains not to belie your expectations!
taunt_3: No matter how thick the armour you are clad in - my blade is but slim, and sharp. I will find a gap!
taunt_4: You are the infestation of this country, you started this war - now reap the fruits of your wrongful acts!
anger_1: I curse you! How could you escape my strike? Which traitor whispered my plans to you?
anger_2: You must be in despair if you adopt such base measures.
plead: How honourable it is to die in battle, thus I humbly choose death through your blade.
nervous_1: I have come from the shades and in those shades shall I linger...
nervous_2: I must not allow you to decide my fate...
victory_1: What a nice army you have. What a pity to see them all die...
victory_2: My troops operate quietly. I will regain the country you have taken from us - piece by piece!
victory_3: Close your eyes... slip through the veil, into eternal night...
victory_4: My intrigues come to fruition - one adversary has fallen victim to my plans!
request: My order is in need of more remedies to push on our cause. Send them without delay!
ally_death: Traitor! You left me in the lurch! You will pay for your hesitancy!
congrats: We operate in the dark to serve the light. Well done, my friend!
boast: The grain of solitariness was planted in my soul many years ago. This grain took root and flourished to become the power that now unfolds!
help: My congregation cannot bear up against direct confrontation - rush to my rescue!
siege: I despatched one of my men to murder an enemy of ours. Maybe you could cause a bit of turmoil with an own attack?
no_attack_1: Your nature is indeed simple - I cannot follow such a halfwitted plan.
no_attack_2: I yield to you, my friend. It is well possible that I will join up with you later. Although, no... rather not.
no_help_1: My men have left behind ideas of freedom. They are content to comply. To anyone, but to you!
no_help_2: Everything in this world is doomed to pass away, and time is so very ephemeral - I do not intend to waste my time for you.
no_sent: My modest order lives from hand to mouth. I have absolutely no provisions to share with you!
sent: I have scraped up the goods you asked for - do me a favour and do not waste them.
team_winning: Our blades are already set against the throats of our enemies. Very soon we will quench the thirst of the desert with their blood!
team_losing: I should have known forging an alliance with you would prove a mistake!
help_sent: Hold out! My henchmen are coming to thin out the ranks of your beleaguerers!
will_attack: But of course! I will set a troop by your side.
